meanings.definition: The act of appointing someone to a position again.
meanings.sent1: Her reappointment as team captain brought joy to the players.
meanings.sent2: The reappointment of the principal was met with applause from the school staff.
meanings.sent3: The reappointment of the class clown as the teacher made for a hilarious day.
meanings.sent4: His reappointment as the leader of the pack made him feel like a lion in the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The reappointment of the chef added a sprinkle of excitement to the kitchen.
